adjectives.description: introverted (comparative more introverted, superlative most introverted)

entries.meaning: Thinking about internal or spiritual matters.
(psychology) Of or characteristic of the personality of an introvert: thoughtful, reflective.
examples: An extraverted individual can hardly understand the necessity that forces the introverted to accomplish his adaptation by first formulating a general conception.

entries.meaning: (poetry, literature) Arranged so that two similar words, lines, etc. form the middle of the structure.
examples: In the Quatrain Reversed or Introverted, the first line corresponds with the fourth.

entries.meaning: simple past tense and past participle of introvert
